findings.title: Hard-coded 404 threshold not configurable
findings.issue: REPO_404_THRESHOLD is a const (3) rather than a configurable value
findings.suggestion: Could be moved to config but not blocking â€” 3 is a reasonable default
findings.impact: Minor inflexibility if threshold needs adjustment without code change

findings.title: No notification on auto-deprecation
findings.issue: Skills are auto-deprecated silently without operator notification
findings.suggestion: Consider adding webhook/email notification on deprecation in follow-up
findings.impact: Operators may not notice deprecated skills until reviewing logs
